verses.verse: The burden<WH4853> of Moab:<WH4124> for in a night,<WH3915> Ar<WH6144> of Moab<WH4124> is laid waste,<WH7703> and brought to nothing;<WH1820> for in a night<WH3915> Kir<WH7024> of Moab<WH4124> is laid waste,<WH7703> and brought to nothing.<WH1820>

They have gone up<WH5927> to Bayith,<WH1006> and to Dibon,<WH1769> to the high places,<WH1116> to weep.<WH1065> Moab<WH4124> wails<WH3213> over Nebo<WH5015> and over Medeba.<WH4311> Baldness<WH7144> is on all of their heads.<WH7218> Every beard<WH2206> is cut off.<WH1438>
In their streets,<WH2351> they clothe<WH2296> themselves in sackcloth.<WH8242> In their streets<WH7339> and on their housetops,<WH1406> everyone wails,<WH3213> weeping<WH1065> abundantly.<WH3381>

Heshbon<WH2809> cries<WH2199> out with Elealeh.<WH500> Their voice<WH6963> is heard<WH8085> even to Jahaz.<WH3096> Therefore the armed men<WH2502> of Moab<WH4124> cry aloud.<WH7321> Their souls<WH5315> tremble within them.<WH3415>

My heart<WH3820> cries out<WH2199> for Moab!<WH4124> Her nobles<WH1280> flee to Zoar,<WH6820> to Eglath<WH5697> Shelishiyah;<WH7992> for they go up<WH4608> by the ascent<WH5927> of Luhith<WH3872> with weeping;<WH1065> for in the way<WH1870> of Horonaim,<WH2773> they raise up<WH5927> a cry<WH2201> of destruction.<WH7667>
For the waters<WH4325> of Nimrim<WH5249> will be desolate;<WH4923> for the grass<WH1877> has withered away,<WH3001> the tender grass<WH1877> fails,<WH3615> there is no green thing.<WH3418>
Therefore they will carry<WH6213> away the abundance<WH3502> they have gotten,<WH6213> and that which they have stored up,<WH6486> over the brook<WH5158> of the willows.<WH6155>
For the cry<WH2201> has gone around<WH5362> the borders<WH1366> of Moab;<WH4124> its wailing<WH3215> to Eglaim,<WH97> and its wailing<WH3215> to Beer Elim.<WH879>

For the waters<WH4325> of Dimon<WH1775> are full<WH4390> of blood;<WH1818> for I will bring<WH7896> yet more<WH3254> on Dimon,<WH1775> a lion<WH738> on those of Moab<WH4124> who escape,<WH6413> and on the remnant<WH7611> of the land.<WH127>
